title: Panna cotta with roasted rhubarb and dripping cake
description: Dripping cake is rich, sweet and laced with dried fruit - very similar to lardy cakes. James serves his as a dessert with a light panna cotta and roasted rhubarb.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways and seeds scraped out
2-3 gelatine leaves, soaked in water for a few minutes
225g/8oz mixed dried fruit and candied peel
